trans-unit.source: Specifies the attributes of a bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 指定點陣圖影像的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The BitmapData class is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.LockBits*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap.UnlockBits*> methods of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: BitmapData 類別會由<> *> 和<> *> 方法<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Not inheritable.
trans-unit.target: 無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pixel height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的像素高度<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Also sometimes referred to as the number of scan lines.
trans-unit.target: 也有時稱為掃描行數。

trans-unit.source: The pixel height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 像素高度<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the format of the pixel information in the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> object that returned this <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定中的像素歷史資訊的格式<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>傳回此物件<xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The format defines how many bits of memory are needed to store the color information for a single pixel.
trans-unit.target: 格式定義儲存單一像素的色彩資訊需要多少位元的記憶體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"></xref> that specifies the format of the pixel information in the associated <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Imaging.PixelFormat"> </xref> ，指定以相關聯的像素歷史資訊的格式<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Reserved.
trans-unit.target: 已保留。

trans-unit.source: Do not use.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用。

trans-unit.source: Reserved.
trans-unit.target: 已保留。

trans-unit.source: Do not use.
trans-unit.target: 請勿使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the address of the first pixel data in the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定點陣圖中的第一個像素資料的位址。

trans-unit.source: This can also be thought of as the first scan line in the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 這可以也被視為第一個掃描線在點陣圖中。

trans-unit.source: The address of the first pixel data in the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 在點陣圖中的第一個像素資料的位址。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the stride width (also called scan width) of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 stride （也稱為掃描寬度） 的寬度<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The stride is the width of a single row of pixels (a scan line), rounded up to a four-byte boundary.
trans-unit.target: Stride 是單一資料列的像素 （掃描線），無條件進位到四個位元組界限的寬度。

trans-unit.source: If the stride is positive, the bitmap is top-down.
trans-unit.target: 如果 stride 是正數，點陣圖是由上而。

trans-unit.source: If the stride is negative, the bitmap is bottom-up.
trans-unit.target: 如果 stride 是負值，點陣圖是由下往。

trans-unit.source: The stride width, in bytes, of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Stride 寬度，以位元組為單位的<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the pixel width of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的像素寬度<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This can also be thought of as the number of pixels in one scan line.
trans-unit.target: 這可以也被視為在掃描中的一行中的像素數目。

trans-unit.source: The pixel width of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 像素寬度<xref href="System.Drawing.Bitmap"></xref>物件。
